other_tests.findings: Diagnosis of cystic fibrosis due to elevated sweat chloride levels.
Forced expiratory volume in first second (FEV1) showed significant improvement post aggressive therapy.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Initial decline, improved after aggressive treatment in August 2003 and maintained benefit over next 7 years.

other_tests.findings: Improvement in symptoms and lung function after the first course.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Sustained improvements; patient reported feeling significantly better and remained stable over 3 years.

other_tests.findings: Regular use reported as beneficial, with patient stating it has 'given him his life back'.
